nodes.bodyText: Method addPlayerCombatHistoryText has a Cognitive Complexity of 11 (exceeds 7 allowed). Consider refactoring.

This is OK because the following two existing findings are fixed:
Method writeUnitsToHistory has a Cognitive Complexity of 26 (exceeds 7 allowed). Consider refactoring.
Method writeUnitsToHistory has 78 lines of code (exceeds 30 allowed). Consider refactoring.

https://codeclimate.com/github/triplea-game/triplea/pull/6529
There's certainly more places where we can simplify or 'fix' responsibilities and change logic ownership, but I recognize we are mostly moving code here.
